pageContext.claim: “Look at those cameras are running with those red lights, but every time I mentioned their name, those red lights go off. You know the red lights, that means you're live, and then you start talking about -- they say, get the lights off. Turn it off. Go to a break. Let's go to a break right now." That fake news, CNN, they don't know what -- They are so fake.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump sometimes falsely claims that he can see a camera light indicating that CNN is cutting away from his rally in real time.
